name: Bard
lore: Bards are loremasters and storytellers, combining music, magic, and knowledge to weave powerful tales and enchant audiences.

subclasses.name: Minstrel
subclasses.description: Masters of music and magic, capable of enchanting audiences with their melodic performances. Minstrels often travel far and wide, spreading tales of heroism and romance.

subclasses.name: Skald
subclasses.description: Warriors who combine the power of their voices with martial prowess. Skalds inspire their allies in battle through epic recitations and battle chants, bolstering their courage and strength.

subclasses.name: Loremaster
subclasses.description: Scholars and historians who use their knowledge to unravel mysteries and uncover ancient secrets. Loremasters are adept at deciphering ancient texts and understanding the arcane symbolism hidden within.
